name: Pure Storage PowerShell Toolkit
tagline: PowerShell Toolkit that provides useful cmdlets for managing Windows Server, SQL Server, VMware and the Pure Storage FlashArrays.
body:
### Welcome to the Pure Storage PowerShell Toolkit Project
...

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors
Barkz (@barkz) 

### Support or Contact
Looking for details on how to use the Pure Storage PowerShell Toolkit? Open a Windows PowerShell session, Import-Module PureStoragePowerShellToolkit and use Get-Help.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
